title: Come and work for BikeRadar! We’re recruiting
content:
Want to work for BikeRadar? This is your chance! We’re recruiting for two new roles in the editorial team.

BikeRadar is growing quickly and this is a rare opportunity to join us in one of the following positions:

  • SEO editor (view the job advert)
  • Senior production editor (view the job advert)

BikeRadar’s SEO editor will play a key role in planning, commissioning, writing and updating content across the site, helping our market-leading reviews, buyer’s guides and advice articles reach as many cyclists as possible. Applications for this position close on Sunday 3 October.

We’re also looking for a senior production editor to join BikeRadar. This position sits at the heart of the editorial team and is responsible for organising and editing content across BikeRadar, ensuring that copy is accurate, interesting and delivered on time.

If you know your colons from your semi-colons and have a passion for bikes, this is the role for you. Applications close on Wednesday 29 September.

Job adverts for both vacancies are available to view on the Immediate Media website.
author: BikeRadar
